title.value: Author Correction: 30×30 biodiversity gains rely on national coordination
title.justification: The paper being analyzed is the correction for the original paper titled "30×30 biodiversity gains rely on national coordination".
title.quote: Author Correction: 30×30 biodiversity gains rely on national coordination

extractions.description: This is a correction notice for the article '30×30 biodiversity gains rely on national coordination'. The correction addresses errors in panel b of Figure 2 of the original article, where some elements were missing.

type.justification: The document is a correction notice, which does not present new experimental work or data but corrects previous information.
type.quote: The original version of this Article contained errors in panel b of Figure 2.

name.justification: The original paper discusses biodiversity, and the correction notice is related to that content.
name.quote: biodiversity gains rely on national coordination
